successes.title: CogniToys: Internet-connected Smart Toys that Learn and Grow
successes.description: We bring toys to life with speech and a personality, allowing them to interactively engage and grow with a child.

Pledges.description: Thanks for helping us get started. You will get exclusive news and updates as we build the world's smartest toy.

You are helping make it happen and you will "Become an Answer" and forever live in our source code as an answer to "who made you?"
+ Get all the exclusive news and updates as we launch CogniToys

"EARLY BIRD" COGNITOYS CARNIVORE!
 
You get what you want. Thanks for the support and you will receive:

(1) CogniToys Green Dino - World's smartest toy
+ Live forever in our source code as the answer to "who made you"
+ Get all the exclusive news and updates
For being one of our first backers, early birds will be getting our Green CogniToy Dino at a discounted price!

COGNITOYS CARNIVORE!
 
You get what you want. Thanks for the support and you will receive:
